q: The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. Nokia shares were down more than 15 percent on Friday afternoon in response to the news, which analysts took as a sign of weakness from the world's largest mobile phone manufacturer. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . Stephen Elop said Nokia would remain based in Finland but said job losses globally would be inevitable. For Microsoft the deal provides a valuable distribution channel for its mobile platform as well as

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race." I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an" innovator and entrepreneur to the core" and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed.
